property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. Until end of turn, its base [ATK] is 7 as long as it's a Truck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Focus 1. When the upgraded character battles and you flip at least [W] -> It gets +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [W] -_ It gets +2 [DEF] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your Decepticons defends. When Revealed -> Do damage to the attacker equal to the number of Upgrades on that attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Planes or Helicopters only. Up to 3 Multi-Missile Pods can fit in 1 Weapon slot. When the upgraded character attacks -> You may scrap this. If you do, do damage to each enemy equal to the number of Multi-Missile Pods scrapped from the upgraded character this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy a character from under your Trypticon, Assault Base to the battlefield.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take attack damage -> Instead it takes half that much damage rounded down, and you scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Tanks only. When the upgraded character defends -> Scrap this card after the battle. Then if you flipped at least [Bl] that battle, do 1 damage to theattacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. It gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn. When the chosen character does 4 or more attack damage to an enemy this turn without KO'ing it -> Use one of the chosen character's Bounty abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on a character that has more than one alt mode. At the end of your turn -> Flip the upgraded character to another mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When a character is KO'd. When Revealed -> Use a Bounty ability of one of your cards on the battlefield.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Scrap this card after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: The upgraded character has +1 [ATK] for each Upgrade on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Autobot you have on the battlefield, put the top card of your deck into your KO area face up. If your deck and scrap pile are empty - You win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each enemy Secret Action face up or face down, do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: The upgraded character has an extra Armor slot. When you put this on a character -> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Armor, play it onto the upgraded character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your characters gets Pierce 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets an extra Weapon slot until end of turn. If that character is a Mercenary _> You may play a Weapon from your scrap pile onto it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move any number of damage counters from one of your characters to one of your other characters, but not enough to KO it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [W] _> It gets +3 [ATK] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your Decepticons takes more than enough attack damage to be KO'd. When Revealed -> Do the extra attack damage to the attacker. Then put this card into your KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your cards get Bold 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revenge -> Scrap an enemy Weapon or Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. It gets +3 [ATK] while attacking in alt mode this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If one of your Autobots would take enough attack damaged to be KO'd. When Revealed -> Instead that character takes enough attack damage to be at 1 {HP]. Then put this card into your KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> That character gets Tough 3 until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If your opponent would draw a second card during their turn. When Revealed -> If your opponent would draw a card this turn, you draw a card instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: The upgraded character has Stealth while Untapped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is scrapped from a character -> Return this to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. Return another character that has the same number of [STAR] or fewer from your KO area to the battlefield fully repaired. Move the damage counters and Upgrades from chosen character to the returned character. Then KO the chosen character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When your opponent plays an [B] Action. When Revealed -> Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip the upgraded character to another mode -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip the upgraded character to another mode -> It gets Bold 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends and you flip battle icons of at least 4 different colors -> That character can't take more than 4 attack damage this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Repair 1 damage from it. Safeguard 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Untap one of your characters that has 6 [STAR] or fewer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this only if you had a Mercenary on your starting team. One of your Decepticons gets +3 [ATK] and Pierce 3 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this only if you had a Mercenary on your starting team. Repair 3 damage from one of your Autobots.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When an enemy attacks and your opponent flips 7 or more battle cards. When Revealed -> This battle [O] doesn't add to [ATK] and [Bl] doesn't give Pierce.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Decepticon you have on the battlefield, Plan 1. When one of your characters attacks this turn, if its Upgrades include at least [W][O][Bl][B][G] and you flip at least [W][O][Bl][B][G] -> Do 15 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Decepticons attacks an enemy this turn -> You get an extra attack this turn, but only with one of your other Decepticons against the same enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses 3 cards from their hand and reveals them. You scrap one of them.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: The upgraded character has Brave while tapped.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Trypticon, Assault Base on the battlefield -> Put Full-Tilt, Wipe-Out, and Brunt from your KO area onto the battlefield fully repaired. The characters put onto the battlefield this way attack this turn. At end of turn, put each of those characters that's still on the battlefield under Trypticon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap an Upgrade from any character -> Repair 2 damage from that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> Scrap all the attacker's Weapons.

property.name: Text
property.value: The upgraded character has an extra Weapon slot. When you put this on a character -> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a weapon, play it onto the upgraded character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip one of your characters to another mode. Then flip it to another mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks an enemy from a different faction -> The upgraded character gets +2 [ATK] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move 1 damage counter from one of your characters to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When revealed -> That character gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle. The attacker can't use Pierce this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender. When revealed -> One of your Autobots gets Brave until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When there is a Melee character -> It has +2 [ATK]. When this is on a Ranged character and it attacks -> Scrap this card and do 2 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters in bot mode defends. When revealed -> Flip that character to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Can't be put on Autobots. Tough 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: If damage would be repaired from the upgraded character -> Instead repair that much damage plus 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Can't be put on Decepticons. Bold 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Choose a battle card you own from outside the game that has exactly 1 [STAR] and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it. If this is the third War of Attrition you've played this turn -> Repair 3 damage from one of your characters. You may play another War of Attrition.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from one of your Melee characters. If you have a Ranged character on the battlefield -> Draw a card. If you have a Specialist on the battlefield -> Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this has at least one Upgrade and defends -> He gets +1 [DEF] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this has at least 3 Upgrades and Battles -> He gets +3 [ATK] and +3 [DEF] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this has at least 2 Upgrades and attacks -> He gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each of your characters get Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all Upgrades from among them into your hand. Scrap the rest.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card battles -> Draw a card. Then you may reveal an Upgrade from your hand and put it on top of your deck. If you do, flip one more battle card this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth against Autobots and Decepticons. When you flip to this mode -> Autobots and Decepticons can't use Stealth this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Flip this and draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may play a [Bl] card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Repair 3 damage from this.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has 3 Utility slots. When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Action, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has 3 Utility slots. When this attacks and you flip [O][B} -> You may play one of your flipped Upgrades onto this after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has +2 [ATK] for each card under him. When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card for each card under this and for each Upgrade it has. Then scrap that many cards from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has +2 [ATK] for each card under it. When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Put the bottom card of your deck face down under this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent scraps a number of cards from the top of their deck equal to this character's [DEF] total.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your opponent reshuffles their deck -> They choose one of their characters and do damage to it equal to this character's [ATK] total.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this only with MTX-S2A Guided Missile Launcher. They start the game assembled as Sergeant Six-Gun. Pierce 4. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this only with MTX-M2 Anti-Gravity Cannon. They start the game assembled as Sergeant Six-Gun. This can be in an Armor or Utility slot. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into the KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Reveal the top card of your deck. You may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent chooses one of their Autobots and does 1 damage to it. This has +3 [ATK] while attacking an Autobot.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Do 2 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent chooses one of their Decepticons and does 1 damage to it. This has +3 [ATK] while attacking a Decepticon.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends -> Do 2 damage to the attacker. Your opponent scraps the top 2 cards of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> You may scrap 2 cards from your hand. If you do, scrap an enemy Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> You may scrap 2 cards from your hand. If you do, do 1 damage to an enemy. When your opponent reshuffles their deck, if you have Omega Supreme (Spaceship) and Omega Supreme (Base) on the battlefield or in your KO pile -> Combine them into Captain Omega Supreme.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Repair 3 damage from it. When this is removed from a character -> Do 3 damage to it. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has Stealth while untapped (Enemies attack other characters if able.)

property.name: Text
property.value: [TAP] Scrap a [W] card from your hand -> Each player scraps their hand and draws 4 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Safeguard 3. The character's Upgrade can't be scrapped by your opponent's cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a [G] card -> This card gains +1 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has Stealth while untapped (Enemies attack other characters if able.)

property.name: Text
property.value: [TAP] Scrap a [Bl] card from your hand -> Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Safeguard 3 (Can't take more than 3 damage while undamaged) When you shuffle your deck and this doesn't have a battle card under him - Put the bottom card of your deck face down under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this has a battle card under him - You may play another action on each of your turns.
